affinity.description: The affinity setting for an instance on a Dedicated Host.

availabilityZone.description: The Availability Zone for the instance.

groupName.description: The name of the placement group for the instance.

hostId.description: The ID of the Dedicated Host for the instance.

hostResourceGroupArn.description: The ARN of the Host Resource Group in which to launch instances.

partitionNumber.description: The number of the partition the instance should launch in. Valid only if the placement group strategy is set to partition.

tenancy.description: The tenancy of the instance (if the instance is running in a VPC). Can be `default`, `dedicated`, or `host`.
